category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWS_FullTextSearch_Solr_MaxBooleanClauses
preference.preference_description: Represents "maxBooleanClauses" value of solrconfig.xml. If this preference value is modified,"maxBooleanClauses" value of solrconfig.xml has to be modified with the same value of this preference.
